"Top 10 Apps All Android Users Should Try" - TechCrunch

Would you like to upgrade Catch Notes?
An error occurred while attempting to display the Android Market.
Click any button to test Catch Intents:
Who is the fairest of them all

• Start of command
+ Continue to say...
/ Say only one of
() Optional
~ Interactive command
[D] Disabled
[R] Root only

Set Your Name!
• Call me + 'your name' 

Cancel Command
• Cancel 
• Never mind 
• Shush! 
• Cancel cancel [mid-sentence] 

Time
• What's the time ? 
• What's the time in 
+ 'City Country' ? 

Date
• What's the date ? 
• What date is it? 

Weather
• What's the weather doing ? 
• What's the weather like in +'City Country' ? 

Texting
• Text + 'contact name' ~ 
• Read my last text message 

Emailing
• Email + 'contact name' ~ 

Facebook
• Facebook status ~ 

Twitter
• Tweet ~ 

Foursquare
• Checkin to + 'venue name' 

Battery
• What is my battery 
+ level 
+ temperature 
+ health 
+ status 
+ voltage 

Contacts
• Display contact +'contact name' 

Calling
• Skype +'contact name' 
• Call +'contact name' ~ 
• Call +'contact name' at/on 
+ home/work/mobile 

• Call +'number' 
• Redial 
• Call back 

Music
• Play +'artist' +'track name' 
• Stream +'track name' [Google Music] 
• Spotify +'track name' [D] 

Applications
• Open/launch/load +'name of app' 
• Kill +'name of app' 
• Which application am I using ? 
• Application settings +'name of app'


• Search for

+ trending/editor's choice/top paid/top free

+ top new free/top new paid/featured/top grossing

+ applications
	


WiFi
• Toggle WiFi 
• Turn/switch on/off WiFi 

Mobile Data
• Toggle (mobile) data 
• Turn/switch on/off (mobile) data 

Bluetooth
• Toggle Bluetooth 
• Turn/switch on/off Bluetooth 

Airplane Mode
• Toggle airplane mode 
• Turn/switch on/off airplane mode 

Navigation
• Navigate to +'destination' 
• Navigate to contact +'contact name' +(at + home/work) 
• Find my car 

Calendar
• Set/create/new (a) appointment/event/calendar entry 
+ event details 
+ (called + event name) 

Alarms
• Set (an) alarm/reminder in +'hours minutes' called +'alarm name' 

Translation
• Translate to 
+ German +'phrase' 
+ French +'phrase' 
+ Romanian +'phrase' 
+ Spanish +'phrase' 
+ Italian +'phrase' 
+ Polish +'phrase' 

Web Search
• Search 
+ Google +'your search term' 
+ Bing +'search term' 
+ Yahoo +'search term' 
+ for images/pictures of +'search term' 
• Go to +'website name' dot com/net/etc 

Video Search
• Search 
+ for videos of +'search term' 

Movie Search
• Search 
+ for the movie/film +'title' 

Notes
• New note 
• New voice note 

Volume
• Set sound profile to 
+ vibrate 
+ silent 
+ normal 
• Speak louder 
• Speak maximum 
• Speak softer 
• Speak minimum 

Spelling and Meanings
• Spell +'word' 
• Define +'word' [D] 

Clipboard
• Read the clipboard 
• Toast the clipboard 
• Translate the clipboard 
• Remember this +'clipboard content' 

File Management
• Browse 
+ directory +'directory name' 
+ subdirectory +'subdirectory name' [slow] 

Screenshot[R] 
• Take a screenshot 

Root Functions[R!] 
• Superuser 
+ reboot 
+ hot reboot 
+ reboot recovery 
+ reboot bootloader 
+ set CPU governor to +'governor name' 

Location Services
• Where am I? [D] 
• Set this location as +'location profile name' ~ [D] 
• I've parked my car 
• Where's my car? 

Password 
• User password ~ 

Google Earth
• Fly to +'location name' 

Tasker
• Display tasks 
• Run task +'your task name' 

Repeat Utterance
• Pardon 
• Can you repeat that? 
• Say that again 
• What did you say? 

Shake-To-Wake
• Enable/Disable shake 
• Set shake to 
+ very low/low/medium/high/very high 

Wave-To-Wake
• Enable/Disable wave 

Visual Results
• Enable/Disable visual results 
• Float command list 

Device Settings
• settings 
• wifi settings 
• bluetooth settings 
• data settings 
• time settings 
• date settings 
• voice search settings 
• tts/text-to-speech settings 
• device settings 
• accessibility settings 
• apn settings 
• application settings 
• display settings 
• input settings 
• storage settings 
• locale settings 
• memory/storage/sd card settings 
• network operator settings 
• nfc settings 
• privacy settings 
• quick launch settings 
• search settings 
• sound/volume settings 
• sync settings 
• dictionary settings 
• location settings 
• Application settings +'name of app'
